thread.title: BRIEF-Fusion Announces Pricing Of Upsized Public Offering Of Common Stock

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fusion Announces Pricing Of Upsized Public Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: brief-fusion announces pricing of upsized public offering of common stock feb

text:
Feb 1 (Reuters) - Fusion Telecommunications International Inc:
* FUSION ANNOUNCES PRICING OF ITS UPSIZED PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK
* FUSION TELECOMMUNICATIONS INTERNATIONAL INC - ‍PRICING OF UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF 11. 25 MILLION SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK AT $3.20 PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
